backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the Home navigation feature and related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries mapping frontend file paths to their descriptions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility imports with extensive CSS variable definitions for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with hero header, Home button to reset chat flow, main guided flow container, and social footer.
frontend/src/config/pegasus.ts: Defines gifting categories, company config, catalogue info, and a helper to generate a WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/Catego: Displays selectable category cards sourced from config with animated styling.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/ChatMe: Renders system and user chat messages with animated entry and styled bubbles.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/CTABut: Renders WhatsApp CTA and catalogue download button with corresponding click handlers.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/Guided: Orchestrates chat steps, message display, interactive elements, scrolling, and restart controls.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/QuickR: Shows quick reply buttons for step interactions, supporting labels and descriptions.
Type definitions for guided flow steps, messages, replies, and flow state.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/useGui: Manages the guided chat flow state, step transitions, user answers, and message history with restart and back-navigation support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and restoring stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wrapper exposing the current backend actor and its loading state for future data queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and a premium goldâ€‘white theme using CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, requirements, and the current state of the Pegasus Gifting implementation.
